text: @channnel has anyone been able to improve core web vitals on HubSpot, if yes please share. Thank you

I want to improve my page speed performance and improve page certain aspects of core web vitals ( FCP, LCP) mainly to do with JS and CSS that's where I struggle the most, Is there an easy way to minimize/ remove unused JS & CSS  files that will certainly improve google's page speed and page experience, Has anyone been able to pass google's page speed evaluation ( excluding image compressions)
